name: biomni-analyze-ddr-network-in-cancer
title: Biomni: Analyze Ddr Network In Cancer
description: Analyze DNA Damage Response (DDR) network alterations and dependencies in cancer samples. Reconstructs the DDR network from genomic data, identifies disruptions in the network, and analyzes dependencies between DDR pathway components in cancer.
content:
Overview

Analyze DNA Damage Response (DDR) network alterations and dependencies in cancer samples. Reconstructs the DDR network from genomic data, identifies disruptions in the network, and analyzes dependencies between DDR pathway components in cancer.

Category

cancer_biology
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/cancer_biology/analyze_ddr_network_in_cancer.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
